headline: No Headline Available

summary: None

summary: Residents and scientists knew that the sloping, peaceful forest in Oso, Wash., rested on silt and glacial sediments with a history of landslides. What they didn't know was how fast the hillside could collapse into a killer cascade.

headline: Leaders of South Korea, Japan Meet for First Time
